datasheets.name: Be’lakor
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Betraying Shades; the Blade of Shadows.

abilities.name: Wreathed in Shadows (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: While a friendly Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this model, that unit can only be targeted by a ranged attack if the attacking model is within 18".

abilities.name: Pall of Despair (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: In the Battle-shock step of your opponent’s Command phase, if an enemy unit that is below its Starting Strength is within 6" of this model, that unit must take a Battle-shock test. For the purposes of this ability, if a unit has a Starting Strength of 1, it is considered to be below its Starting Strength while it has lost one or more wounds.

abilities.name: Shadow Lord (Aura, Psychic)
abilities.description: While a friendly Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this model, you can re-roll Battle-shock and Leadership tests taken for that unit.

other.name: The Dark Master (Aura)
other.description: The area of the battlefield within 6" of this model is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

other.name: Shadow Form
other.description: At the start of the battle round, select one Shadow Form ability (see left). Until the end of the battle round, this model has that ability.

special.name: SUPREME COMMANDER
special.description: If this model is in your army, it must be your Warlord.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Beasts Of Nurgle
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: putrid appendages.

other.name: Grotesque Regeneration
other.description: At the end of each phase, if a Beasts of Nurgle model in this unit has lost any wounds but is not destroyed, that model regains all of its lost wounds.

datasheets.name: Bloodcrushers
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: hellblade; Juggernaut’s bladed horn.
wargear: 1 Bloodcrusher that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
1 Bloodcrusher that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.

wargear.name: Daemonic Icon
wargear.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

wargear.name: Instrument of Chaos
wargear.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Brass Stampede
other.description: Each time this unit ends a Charge move, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this unit and roll one D6 for each model in this unit: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: Bloodletters
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: hellblade.
wargear: 1 Bloodletter that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
1 Bloodletter that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.

wargear.name: Daemonic Icon
wargear.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

wargear.name: Instrument of Chaos
wargear.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Blood Begets Blood
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a melee attack, re-roll a Wound roll of 1. If that attack targets a unit that is Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Wound roll instead.

datasheets.name: Bloodmaster
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Bloodletters
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: blade of blood.

other.name: Bloodmaster
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, add 1 to the Wound roll.

other.name: A Gory Path
other.description: Each time this model’s unit Consolidates, it can move up to 6" instead of up to 3".

datasheets.name: Bloodthirster
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: hellfire breath; great axe of Khorne
wargear: This model’s great axe of Khorne can be replaced with 1 axe of Khorne and one of the following: ◦ 1 bloodflail ◦ 1 lash of Khorne

other.name: Daemon Lord of Khorne (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Khorne Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, add 1 to the Hit roll.

other.name: Relentless Carnage
other.description: At the end of the Fight phase, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model and roll eight D6: for each 4+, that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-6 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Blue Horrors
datasheets.loadout: Every Blue Horror is equipped with: Coruscating Blue Flames; blue claws. Every Brimstone Horror added to this unit using the Split ability is equipped with: Coruscating Yellow Flames; yellow claws.

other.name: Split
other.description: Each time a Blue Horror model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model. On a 4+, add one Brimstone Horror model to this unit.

other.name: Cackling Horrors (Aura)
other.description: While an enemy unit is within 6" of this unit, if this unit contains one or more Blue Horror models, subtract 1 from that enemy unit’s Leadership characteristic.

other.name: Exploding Horrors
other.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it, then select one or more Brimstone Horror models in this unit. For each Brimstone Horror model you select, roll one D6: on a 4+, that model is destroyed and that enemy unit suffers 1 mortal wound.

datasheets.name: Burning Chariot
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Fire of Tzeentch; Flamer mouths; Screamer bites.

other.name: Eldritch Flames (Psychic)
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the end of the phase, that unit cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

datasheets.name: Changecaster
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Blue Horrors ■ Pink Horrors
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Arcane Fireball; Herald combat weapon.

other.name: Changecaster
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

other.name: Storm of Mutating Sorcery (Psychic)
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy Infantry unit hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

datasheets.name: Contorted Epitome
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Daemonettes
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: coiled tentacles; ravaging claws.

other.name: Swallow Energy (Psychic)
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 4+ ability against mortal wounds and Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Horrible Fascination(Psychic)
other.description: At the start of your opponent’s Shooting phase, one Psyker model from your army with this ability can use it. If it does, select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to that Psyker model and roll one D6: on a 1, that Psyker model suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 2-5, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll; on a 6, that enemy unit is not eligible to shoot this phase.

datasheets.name: Daemon Prince Of Chaos
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons. DAEMONIC ALLEGIANCE When you select this model to include in your army, you must select one of the following keywords for it to gain: ■ Khorne ■ Tzeentch ■ Nurgle ■ Slaanesh The keyword you select will also affect some of this model’s characteristics, as stated overleaf.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Khorne
abilities.description: If this model has the Khorne keyword, add 2 to the Strength characteristic of this model’s hellforged weapons.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Tzeentch
abilities.description: If this model has the Tzeentch keyword, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s infernal cannon.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Nurgle
abilities.description: If this model has the Nurgle keyword, add 1 to this model’s Toughness characteristic.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
abilities.description: If this model has the Slaanesh keyword, add 2" to this model’s Move characteristic.

other.name: Prince of Darkness (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.

other.name: Unholy Vigour
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of any phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, this model has a 3+ invulnerable save.

datasheets.name: Daemon Prince Of Chaos With Wings
composition: 1 Daemon Prince of Chaos with Wings
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: infernal cannon; hellforged weapons. DAEMONIC ALLEGIANCE When you select this model to include in your army, you must select one of the following keywords for it to gain: ■ Khorne ■ Tzeentch ■ Nurgle ■ Slaanesh The keyword you select will also affect some of this model’s characteristics, as stated overleaf.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Nurgle
abilities.description: If this model has the Nurgle keyword, add 1 to this model’s Toughness characteristic.

abilities.name: Daemon Prince of Slaanesh
abilities.description: If this model has the Slaanesh keyword, add 2" to this model’s Move characteristic.

other.name: Malefic Destruction
other.description: Once per battle, at the start of the Fight phase, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the phase, add 3 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s hellforged weapons.

other.name: Harbinger of Death
other.description: Each time this model is selected to fight, select one of the following abilities. Until the end of the phase,

other.name: this model’s hellforged weapons have that ability
other.description: ■ [LETHAL HITS] ■ [PRECISION] ■ [SUSTAINED HITS 1]

datasheets.name: Epidemius
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Plaguebearers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: balesword and Nurgling attendants.

other.name: Blessed by the Plague God
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a 4+ invulnerable save.

other.name: Tally of Pestilence
other.description: Keep a tally of how many enemy models are destroyed by Nurgle Legiones Daemonica models from your army during the battle. At the start of your Command phase, if this tally is 7 or more, you gain 1CP and the tally is reset to 0.

datasheets.name: Exalted Flamer
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Flamers MANIFESTATION OF DESTRUCTION This model cannot be your Warlord and cannot be given Enhancements.
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Fire of Tzeentch; Flamer mouths.

other.name: Blazing Warpfire (Psychic)
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

other.name: Flames of Change (Psychic)
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) hit by one or more of those attacks, and roll one D6. On a 4+, until the end of your opponent’s next turn, that enemy unit is aflame. While a unit is aflame, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.

datasheets.name: Exalted Seeker Chariot
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: lashes of torment; Exalted Seeker tongues; slashing claws.

other.name: Infernal Engines of Torment
other.description: In the Fight phase, after this model has finished making its attacks, if one or more enemy units were destroyed as a result of those attacks, every enemy unit within 6" of this model must take a Battle- shock test.

datasheets.name: Fateskimmer
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Screamers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Arcane Fireball; Herald combat weapon; Screamer bites.

other.name: Fateskimmer
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

other.name: Rider of the Immaterial Winds
other.description: Once per battle, at the end of your opponent’s turn, if this model’s unit is not within Engagement Range of one or more enemy units, you can remove that unit from the battlefield and place it into Strategic Reserves.

datasheets.name: Feculent Gnarlmaw
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: nothing. WARGEAR OPTIONS ■   None

other.name: Shroud of Flies (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Nurgle Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this Fortification, models in that unit have the Stealth ability.

other.name: Diseased Cover
other.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

other.name: Fortification
other.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more Fortifications from your army: ■  That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. ■  Models in that unit so not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

datasheets.name: Fiends
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: barbed tail and dissecting claws.

other.name: Soporific Musk (Aura)
other.description: While an enemy unit (excluding Vehicle and Titanic units) is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that enemy unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll, and each time a model in that enemy unit takes a Desperate Escape test, subtract 1 from that test.

datasheets.name: Flamers
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: Flickering Flames; Flamer mouths.

other.name: Bounding Leaps
other.description: This unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back.

datasheets.name: Flesh Hounds
datasheets.loadout: The Gore Hound is equipped with: burning roar; gore-drenched fangs; collar of Khorne. Every Flesh Hound is equipped with: gore-drenched fangs; collar of Khorne.

wargear.description: The bearer has the Feel No Pain 3+ ability against Psychic Attacks.

other.name: Pouncing Hunters
other.description: You can target this unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Pink Horrors ■ Blue Horrors
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Arcane Fireball; Herald combat weapon.

other.name: Fluxmaster
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time an attack is made against that unit, subtract 1 form the Hit roll.

other.name: Altered Reality (Psychic)
other.description: Once per battle round, after a Hit roll, a Wound roll or a saving throw is made for this model, you can change the result of that roll to a 6.

datasheets.name: Great Unclean One
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: plague flail; putrid vomit; bilesword.
wargear: This model’s plague flail can be replaced with 1 bileblade.
This model’s bilesword can be replaced with 1 doomsday bell.

other.name: Daemon Lord of Nurgle (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Nurgle Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this model, models in that unit have the Feel No Pain 6+ ability.

other.name: Nurgle’s Rot (Psychic)
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. Until the start of your next Movement phase, subtract 1 from the Toughness characteristic of models in that unit.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Hellflayer
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: lashes of torment; bladed axle; Seeker tongues; slashing claws.

other.name: Cutting Down the Foe
other.description: Each time this unit is selected to fight, you can select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of it and roll one D6, adding 2 to the result if that unit is an Infantry unit: on a 2-3, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 4-5, that enemy unit suffers 3 mortal wounds; on a 6+, that enemy unit suffers D3+3 mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: Horticulous Slimux
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Beasts of Nurgle
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: acidic maw; lopping shears.

other.name: Beast Handler
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, you can re-roll Charge rolls made for that unit. In addition, once per battle, you can target that unit with the Heroic Intervention Stratagem for 0CP, and can do so even if you have already used that Stratagem on a different unit this phase.

other.name: Seed the Garden of Nurgle
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, if this model is within an Area Terrain feature, until the end of the battle, that Area Terrain feature is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos.

datasheets.name: Infernal Enrapturess
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Daemonettes
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: heartstring lyre; ravaging claws.

other.name: Harmonic Alignment
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, in your Command phase, you can return D3 destroyed Bodyguard models to that unit.

other.name: Discordant Disruption (Aura)
other.description: While an enemy Psyker unit is within 12" of this model, Psychic weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [HAZARDOUS] ability.

datasheets.name: Kairos Fateweaver
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Infernal Gateway; Staff of Tomorrow.

other.name: One Head Looks Forward (Aura)
other.description: Each time you target a friendly Tzeentch Legiones Daemonica unit within 6" of this model with a Stratagem, roll one D6: if the result is greater than the current battle round number, you gain 1CP.

other.name: One Head Looks Back
other.description: Once per battle, after your opponent uses a Stratagem, this model can use this ability. If it does, until the end of the battle, each time your opponent uses that Stratagem, increase its cost to your opponent by 1CP.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

Weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability when targeting this model’s prey. Each time this model’s prey is destroyed, select one new enemy unit to be this model’s prey.

other.name: one of the following abilities

datasheets.name: Nurglings
datasheets.loadout: Every model is equipped with: diseased claws and teeth.

other.name: Mischief Makers (Aura)
other.description: While an enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) is within 6" of this unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Pink Horrors
datasheets.loadout: Every Pink Horror is equipped with: Coruscating Pink Flames; pink claws. Every Blue Horror added to this unit using the Split ability is equipped with: Coruscating Blue Flames; blue claws. Every Brimstone Horror added to this unit using the Split ability is equipped with: Coruscating Yellow Flames; yellow claws. HORRORS ARE PINK. HORRORS ARE BLUE. WHERE ONCE THERE WAS ONE, NOW THERE ARE TWO. If, at any point, this unit contains no Pink Horror models, use the Blue Horrors datasheet for this unit. Designer’s Note: While this unit contains one or more Pink Horror models, the Cackling Horrors and Exploding Horrors abilities from the Blue Horrors datasheet do not apply to this unit.
wargear: 1 Pink Horror that is not equipped with a daemonic icon can be equipped with 1 instrument of Chaos.
1 Pink Horror that is not equipped with an instrument of Chaos can be equipped with 1 daemonic icon.

wargear.name: Daemonic Icon
wargear.description: Models in the bearer’s unit have a Leadership characteristic of 6+.

wargear.name: Instrument of Chaos
wargear.description: Add 1 to Charge rolls made for the bearer’s unit.

other.name: Split
other.description: Each time a Pink Horror or Blue Horror model in this unit is destroyed, after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, if this unit is not destroyed, roll one D6 for that model. On a 4+, if it was a Pink Horror, add two Blue Horror models to this unit, and if it was a Blue Horror, add one Brimstone Horror model to this unit.

other.description: You can re-roll Advance and Charge rolls made for this unit.

datasheets.name: Shalaxi Helbane
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: lash of Slaanesh; Pavane of Slaanesh; snapping claws; soulpiercer.

other.name: Cloak of Constriction
other.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within Engagement Range of this model. Until the end of the phase, subtract 1 from the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by that unit.

other.name: Monarch of the Hunt
other.description: Each time this model declares a charge that targets a Monster, Vehicle or Character unit, you can re-roll the Charge roll. Each time this model makes a melee attack that targets a Monster, Vehicle or Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll, the Wound roll and the Damage roll.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Skarbrand
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: bellow of endless fury; Slaughter and Carnage.

other.name: Rage Embodied (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Khorne Legiones Daemonica unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) is within 6" of this model, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons equipped by models in that unit.

other.name: Murderlust (Aura)
other.description: While a unit is within 6" of this model, each time that unit is selected to Fall Back, it must take a Leadership test. If that test is failed, that unit must Remain Stationary this phase instead.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-7 wounds remaining, add 2 to the Attacks characteristic of this model’s Slaughter and Carnage.

datasheets.name: Skull Altar
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: nothing. WARGEAR OPTIONS ■   None

other.name: Shadow of Khorne (Aura)
other.description: The area of the battlefield within 6" of this Fortification is considered to be within your army’s Shadow of Chaos. In addition, while a friendly Khorne Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this Fortification, each time you take a Battle-shock test for that unit, you can re-roll that test.

other.name: Cover
other.description: Each time a ranged attack is allocated to a model, if that model is not fully visible to every model in the attacking unit because of this Fortification, that model has the Benefit of Cover against that attack.

other.name: Fortification
other.description: While an enemy unit is only within Engagement Range of one or more Fortifications from your army: ■  That unit can still be selected as the target of ranged attacks, but each time such an attack is made, unless it is made with a Pistol, subtract 1 from the Hit roll. ■  Models in that unit so not need to take Desperate Escape tests due to Falling Back while Battle-shocked, except for those that will move over enemy models when doing so.

datasheets.name: Skull Cannon
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: skull cannon; attendants’ hellblades; biting maw.

other.name: Skulls of the Fallen
other.description: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit that was hit by one or more of those attacks. That unit must take a Battle-shock test.

datasheets.name: Skullmaster
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following units: ■ Bloodcrushers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: blade of blood; Juggernaut’s bladed horn.

other.name: Skullmaster’s Fury
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time that unit ends a Charge move, until the end of the turn, Juggernaut’s bladed horns equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

other.name: Devastating Charge
other.description: Each time this model’s unit ends a Charge move, each enemy unit within Engagement Range of that unit must take a Battle-shock test.

datasheets.name: Skulltaker
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Bloodletters
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: the Slayer Sword.

other.name: Lord of Decapitations
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [DEVASTATING WOUNDS] ability.

other.name: Skulls for Khorne
other.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a Character unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll. Each time this model destroys an enemy Character unit, you gain 1CP.

datasheets.name: Sloppity Bilepiper
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Plaguebearers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: marotter.

other.name: Jolly Gutpipes
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Move characteristic of models in that unit and you can re-roll Advance rolls made for that unit.

other.name: Disease of Mirth (Aura)
other.description: At the start of the Fight phase, every enemy unit (excluding Monsters and Vehicles) within 6" of this model must take a Battle-shock test.

datasheets.name: Soul Grinder
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: harvester cannon; iron claw; warpsword.
wargear: This model’s warpsword can be replaced with 1 warpclaw.

abilities.name: DAEMONIC ALLEGIANCE
abilities.description: When you select this model to include in your army, you must select one of the keywords below. Until the end of the battle, this model has that keyword and the additional wargear stated for that keyword below.

abilities.name: Khorne        This model is additionally equipped with
Tzeentch      This model is additionally equipped with
Nurgle        This model is additionally equipped with
Slaanesh      This model is additionally equipped with

other.name: Scuttling Walker
other.description: Each time this model makes a Normal or Advance move, it can move over friendly Monster and Vehicle models and terrain features that are 4" or less in height as if they were not there.

damaged.description: While this model has 1-5 wounds remaining, each time this model makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

datasheets.name: Spoilpox Scrivener
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Plaguebearers
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: disgusting sneezes; plaguesword and distended maw.

other.name: Keep Counting!
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, melee weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

other.name: Meet Your Quota!
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Objective Control characteristic of models in that unit.

datasheets.name: Syll’esske
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Daemonettes
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Cacophonic Choir; scourging whip; Axe of Dominion.

other.name: Prince of Slaanesh
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes a melee attack, a successful unmodified Wound roll of 5+ scores a Critical Wound.

other.name: Delightful Agonies
other.description: The first time this model is destroyed, roll one D6 at the end of the phase. On a 2+, set this model back up on the battlefield, as close as possible to where it was destroyed and not within Engagement Range of any enemy units, with its full wounds remaining.

datasheets.name: The Blue Scribes
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: sharp quills.

other.name: P’tarix’s Sorcerous Syphon (Aura)
other.description: While an enemy unit is within 12" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a Psychic Attack, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

other.name: Xirat’p’s Sorcerous Barrages (Psychic)
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, roll one D6 for each enemy unit within 6" of this model: on a 2-3, that unit suffers 1 mortal wound; on a 4-5, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds; on a 6, that unit suffers D6 mortal wounds.

datasheets.name: The Changeling
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: Infernal Flames; the Trickster’s Staff.

other.name: Formless Horror
other.description: Each time an enemy unit wishes to select this model as the target of an attack, that unit must first take a Battle-shock test. If that test if failed, in addition to being Battle-shocked, that enemy unit cannot target this model this phase.

other.name: Mischief and Confusion
other.description: At the start of your opponent’s Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of and visible to this model and roll one D6: on a 2-5, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that enemy unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll; on a 6, that enemy unit is not eligible to shoot this phase.

datasheets.name: The Masque Of Slaanesh
composition: 1 The Masque of Slaanesh – Epic Hero
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: serrated claws.

other.name: The Eternal Dance
other.description: At the start of the Fight phase, select one enemy unit within 6" of this model. Until the end of the phase: ■  Each time a friendly Slaanesh Legiones Daemonica model makes a melee attack that targets that enemy unit, add 1 to the Wound roll. ■  Each time a model in that enemy unit makes a melee attack, subtract 1 from the Wound roll.

other.name: Dazzling Acrobatics
other.description: This model is eligible to declare a charge in a turn in which it Advanced or Fell Back.

datasheets.name: Tormentbringer On Exalted Seeker Chariot
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: lashes of torment; Exalted Seeker tongues; ravaging claws.

other.name: Tormentbringer (Aura)
other.description: While a friendly Slaanesh Legiones Daemonica unit is within 6" of this model, melee weapons in that unit have the [SUSTAINED HITS 1] ability.

other.name: Hysterical Frenzy (Psychic)
other.description: Once per Fight phase, just after an enemy unit selects a Slaanesh Legiones Daemonica unit from your army as a target, one friendly Psyker that is within 6" of that Slaanesh unit and has this ability can use it. If it does, until the end of the phase, each time a model in that Slaanesh unit is destroyed, roll one D6: on a 4+, do not remove it from play. That model can fight after the attacking model’s unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.

datasheets.name: Tranceweaver
datasheets.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ Daemonettes
datasheets.loadout: This model is equipped with: ravaging claws.

other.name: Tranceweaver
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have the Fights First ability.

other.name: Symphony of Pain (Psychic)
other.description: At the end of your Movement phase, you can select one enemy unit that is Battle-shocked and within 12" of this model. Until the end of the turn, each time a Slaanesh Legiones Daemonica model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.
